Abstract: The main perspective of "Intkut'' is to provide a solution that can detect fake videos generated by Deep Learning Technology sensing with the help of convolutional neural networks and Generative adversarial networks. The main objective of any countermeasure to mitigating malicious synthetic media’s negative societal impact must be two-fold. One, to reduce the exposure to malicious deepfakes and second, to minimize the damage it can inflict. This application can be used by social media companies, media news companies and the government to reduce the fake videos and decrease the proportion of fake news. A multi layered convolutional neural network will be used along with Generative Adversarial Networks(GAN) to encode and decode the characteristics of objects and process them through the neural network to detect the legibility of the video or image. This application can also be used by the defense ministry of the country to evaluate the genuineness of the content received from potential threats.

The Internet is a giant network consisting of millions of users surfing over the internet. This surfing of websites and other platforms makes it difficult to make a count of the visitors. Even if we do so, the real time data in motion changes every second and there’s no way to retain them. Our project entitled “Pushkr - Push Notification” is an important platform where you can use our service and send notifications and regain your visitors. It is also cost effective and yet efficient. Our goal is to retain the visitors and also have an access over them to send the contracted notifications.

Unemployment being major issue of India, managing, analysing and most important predicting unemployment is difficult for government. Unemployment rate is the most common and important Economic Indicator. When Data is structured it is easy to understand and maintain. Unemployment is crucial for government to look at as our country grows if the employment rate are fare at every state and every part of the nation. “Dive in Unemployment” is a Data Visualization and Predicting Tool that make the tons of data, understandable and Easy to Analyse as well as predict unemployment with the help Historical Data and considering real time situation. It shows data in a pictorial Representation with Graphs, Pie charts, Maps and many Visual Data. This helps Government to analyses each state with its unemployment rate, Male/Female ratio of Employment, Year wise analyses, Data of Urban and Rural part of country. On the basis of analyses Government can suggest the Scheme for the underdeveloped area. This will ensure that every part of Country is taken care and not neglected. This also helps in analyses of Women Empowerment with help of Male/Female ratio Data Analyses. So with Data Visualization We get better Idea and better Picture of the Unemployment. And most important aspect is predicting unemployment at small level so that Government can manage and work on those factors. As for dealing with this large Data is cumbersome, our system will help Government to better manage our Country as a whole with all features at a place

Project_name: Plant disease detection using machine learning
Abstract: The problem of effective disease protection is closely joined to the issues of property agriculture, timely and correct diagnosing of plant diseases is one of the pillars of agricultural accuracy. it's vital to stop unessential wastage of cash and different resources, so achieving healthy production during this dynamic atmosphere, during which early interference, correct and timely identification of diseases haven't been additional vital. There are some ways to diagnose plant diseases. Some diseases don't have any obvious symptoms, or the impact seems too late, and in those cases, additional advanced diagnosing is needed

Deep learning has been successfully applied to solve various complex problems ranging from big data analytics to computer vision and human-level control. Deep learning advances however have also been employed to create software that can cause threats to privacy, democracy and national security. One of those deep learning_x0002_powered applications recently emerged is “deepfake”. Deepfake (stemming from “deep learning” and “fake”) is a technique that can superimpose face images of a target person to a video of a source person to create a video of the target person doing or saying things the source person does. Deepfake algorithms can create fake images and videos that humans cannot distinguish them from authentic ones. The proposal of technologies that can automatically detect and assess the integrity of digital visual media is therefore indispensable. We present extensive discussions on challenges, research trends and directions related to deepfake technologies. By reviewing the background of deepfakes and state-of- the-art deepfake detection methods, this study provides a comprehensive overview of deepfake techniques and facilitates the development of new and more robust methods to deal with the increasingly challenging deepfakes.

Project_name: Electricity bill calculating and monitoring web application
Abstract: The existing system needs human intervention. A person must manually collect electricity meter reading and send the data to the company as well as generate the bills. This process is error prone, slow and risky. Also, this process cannot detect equipment failure and does not maintain user history. Thus, this procedure has no scope to improve efficiency. We can simplify and automate this procedure and eliminate human intervention completely by using new technologies. IoT, ML, Cloud technology and web applications are tested in several project all over the world. Utilising this research, we can automate this procedure. We are trying to build this system with an aim to utilise the fusion of IoT, cloud technology and machine learning.

There is no automatic System that detects change between the current and past images for comparison in the satellite imagery platform. so, to solve this problem the model we are developing will use OpenCV Techniques to detect the change in the area, to detect objects in that area, and will visualize those changes by putting marks on that change detection. Our approach for solving the problem is JPG image given by satellite will be re-projected by the python image processing function then data-set will be developed and classification of the image will proceed. Change Detection is Already Running in High-end JPG Images but also giving good Accuracy in Low-End ISRO Images as well. Feature Detection will be only performed on changed areas rather than full images to get to know what is changed in a particular period. So, by that, we will get the image object, changes between the images, and Feature Extractions attribute. These outputs will be visualized on the Django-based web-platform. by Using GPU System, the execution will take lesser time than today's Automatic Systems as well. Automatic alerts of change detection, Pattern recognition of events, visuals, classification based on the land area type will be provided in the project

By paying the money during a Specified Period of time. This system increases customer retention and simplify vehicle and staff Management in an efficient way.

Our main objective of the project is to develop a missing children (people) find application that can be helpful for the common people whose beloved ones have been abducted missed, or rescued by the people. In this Finding Missing People Using Image Processing application or website we provide person with entire data base of the missing children, so that the police can track about the whereabouts or file a case pertaining to the issue. And the children found (known or unknown) details are uploaded by the police or by an appointed agent. Entering details of the children like height, age, etc is a lengthy process and the search output is not efficient. So to avoid this ambiguity we use image processing technique here, a person can upload a picture of whose information is to be known. This Image will be mapped or compared with the images in the database and case details status etc can be displayed. The time efficiency is more and output is also efficient

The purpose of the project entitled as “Online Application for Hospital Management” is to computerize the Front Office Management of Hospital to develop software which is user friendly simple, fast, and cost – effective. It deals with the collection of patient’s information, diagnosis details, etc. Traditionally, it was done manually. The main function of the system is register and store patient details and doctor details and retrieve these details as and when required, and also to manipulate these details meaningfully System input contains patient details, diagnosis details, while system output is to get these details on to the screen. The Hospital Management System can be entered using a username and password. It is accessible either by an administrator or receptionist. Only they can add data into the database. The data can be retrieved easily. The data are well protected for personal use and makes the data processing very fast

Project_name: Fake News Detector - A Complete Solution
Abstract: Increase in the popularity and spread of fake news. Its difficult for  human to detect them. The booming development of online social networks in the recent years has spiked the volume of fake The goal of this project is to create a tool for detecting the language patterns that characterize fake and real news through the use of online machine learning methods.

Project_name: Automatic text summarization of news article
Abstract: People have gotten busier than ever before. Thus, in today’s time and age, people tend to look for quality content accessible in the shortest amount of time possible. We attempt to develop a web application that can allow users to access summarized news, in about 150 words or less. The web application scrapes news articles from a very popular “The Hindu” website and presents its summary to the users. The web application is live meaning database continuously updates at regular intervals to reflect the real-time news. The summarization function for the web application is achieved by passing the 8 input through a fine-tuned transformer model. We have named the web application- News in Bytes.
Null

In this current Scenario, due to covid-19, it is an important to maintain social distancing and we know that it’s very hard to go out, so the online shopping is the best way for shopping. The Objective of the project “Grocery on Safeway” is to provide various online shopping of groceries such as daily needs, Vegetables, Fruits, Bakery Products, Snacks, Beauty Products, Medicine etc. through our application. Also, the facility of customers can select the items from his favourite stores according to their needs. Grocery shopping is a very boring, but an unavoidable business. Want to get rid of it? Then do so. How? This is how. Order groceries online, from top online grocery store and sit back and relax. Yes, it is that simple. Get rid of the tedious task of commuting to the local store for buying groceries. You can get great deals online as well based on festivals. So, here’s an app of the best online grocery store that you help you shop like a pro. The uniqueness of app lies in the fact that they connect consumers with all local stores, selling grocery items. It is an on-demand store that delivers veggies, other grocery items, day to day products as required by the consumers. You have the freedom to shop from the favourite stores, in your area, choose and schedule delivery slots on whatever you order

In this project converter, it consists of image/video processing, Machine Learning and sound generation. For an image processing, it is a series of calculation techniques for analyzing, reconstructing, compressing, and enhancing images. When an object is given as an input, an image will captured through scanning or webcam; and it will be analyzed and manipulated, accomplished using various specialized software applications and output liker a monitor. Image processing and Machine Learning has several techniques, including template matching, KNN (K-Nearest Neighbour), thresholding,CNN(deep learning) and etc. For the template matching, it is a technique for finding small parts of an image to match with the template image; it is also used to identify printed characters, numbers, and other small, simple objects. KNN (K-Nearest Neighbour) is an algorithm that can work very well in practice and easy to understand. It is also a lazy algorithm that does not use the training data points to do any generalization. Besides, thresholding technique is one of the most important approaches to image segmentation. It is a non-linear operation that can converts a gray-scale image into a binary image. The purpose of image processing and machine learning in this project is to analysis of a picture using techniques that can identify shades, colours and relationships that cannot be observed by the human eye. Besides that, an image processing is used to solve identification problems, i.e. in forensic medicine or in establishing weather maps from satellite photos. It assigns with images in bitmapped graphics form that have been scanned in or taken with digital cameras. For sound generation is to generate a sound through pytesseract library or play a wav file from computer or Google voice A

Now a days the life style of the people is different. People feel uncomfortable and time consuming for going crowded markets. So, Clickaway is a boon as it saves lot of time. In Clickaway web application consumers directly buy goods, services etc. from a seller without an intermediary service over the Internet. It would make searching, viewing and selection of a product easier. It contains a sophisticated search engine for users to search for products where a user can search for a product interactively and the search engine would refine the products available based on the user’s input.The user can view complete specification of each product. They can also view product reviews and write their own reviews. This application also provide Voice search feature where user can search various items by voice. Also it provides features like viewing Frequently Asked Questions, view wishlist, View offer of the day etc

The main motive of our project is to provide easy access to medical facilities
even to people living in remote areas. Our project will help a person to fix an
appointment with a doctor without going from one place to another.
‘OMNICARE’ will make the patient’s data easily available to the doctors.
If a person is having mild symptoms of cold, cough etc. ‘OMNICARE’ will
prescribe medicines and also provide natural remedy according to the
symptoms. The medical report of the patient can also be generated online with
the help of our project.
Omnicare will also help in fixing an appointment with a doctor. When the
patient tries to fix an appointment with the doctor, the patient’s data is stored in
our software’s database. The timing and the schedule of the patient’s
appointment is fixed by the doctor, according to the information available in the
database of our software.
‘OMNICARE’ also provides improved access to patient data and it also
improves work efficiency. This means better and quicker clinical decisions. The
faster the clinician gets the diagnostic reports, the quicker he provides the
medicines. Thus, the faster is the patient’s recovery and the better it is on the
patient care index. ‘OMNICARE’ will also provide data security of the patient
and it is also cost effective since the money on visiting the doctor is saved due
to online registration.

Reolo is a hologram technology startup from L.D. College of engineering, Ahmedabad, Gujarat. Hologram technology, which was born out of advanced AR/VR technologies, is the future of 3D technology. Using this technology, you can be present virtually at multiple places simultaneously anywhere in the world, right from your house. This technology enables the audience/user to experience a real life-like feeling and enhances the impact caused; the user wouldn’t feel the absence of the person. Reolo is striving to use this technology in the sector that help shape a state, country or the world: Education

In the past few years, the usage of social media has increased a lot. People post too often
on various social media platforms such as Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, etc. While posting
each time, the user has to think of a new caption (not mandatory). People ask to their friends
for suggestions or google for a good caption.
Automatically describing the contents of an image is a fundamental problem that connects
computer vision and natural language processing. Due to the growing research in the field
of deep learning and social media datasets, the problem can be tackled using generative
neural networks.

We have so many applications that convert text to audio, audio to text, translate text in almost
all languages, but we do not have many applications that take images as input and gives
description as text or audio. It can be achieved by our project “Image Description System”. In
which model works on the pre-processed data of images and text, and that data which has
fetched from different domains. After pre-processing, keyword extraction and model
generation processes are considered for further process to get the most appropriate and accurate
description of the images. This type of application can be very helpful to people when they can
not see the image, they can imagine what is in the image. By using this model we can very
efficiently and in less time search images more accurately by using the description.

The main idea behind our project is to serve people who are craving for the dishes that they
cannot make on their own and even they don't want to eat those dishes made in restaurant,
and so we came up with the idea that those people can still satisfy their craving from the
dishes that are neither made on their own nor from the restaurant. Those people can reach
to the verified chefs from the nearby area through our portal and can collect the dish from
the chef’s home. Also rather than just ordering the dish and waiting for it to be prepared,
they can get the chance to watch their favorite dish being prepared right in front of them
by using the feature that allows the user to call chef at their home to prepare that dish.

and make it so easy and comfortable. Using technology as we can make it 
available to everyone. Book4U will solve problem of not only student but also 
people in general so they can focus on study and can help each other regardless

The basic idea is to implement a Book4U like platform through which different

personal details like name,contact number,address etc,.

give the photo of the items and hit the enter button.

the prices and nearby shops where these product are available at that 
point of time.
 User can order the items if the cart value is greater than some value 
which can be set by the shop owner and users can use different payment
options.
 After every successful purchase,database of the application will be 
updated and if the items will go out of stock then it will remind the shop 
owner about it.
 Also the service will give remind the user of their monthly items
